item.title: Skill cape requirements?!
item.dc:creator: @Jairiya Jairiya
item.description:
@Jairiya wrote:

Ok well i made this not sure if it works totaly didn’t fix it up but here—do not leech and say its urs
This was before silab added some skillcapes and you must use silabs client because i made it for that.

Level Requirement By Dan



Under:

[CODE]
int CLAttack = GetCLAttack(wearID);
[/CODE]

ok add these ints:
[CODE]

                        int CLHitpoints = GetCLHitpoints(wearID);
        		int CLFishing = GetCLFishing(wearID);
               		int CLCooking = GetCLCooking(wearID);
			int CLAgility = GetCLAgility(wearID);
			int CLHerblore = GetCLHerblore(wearID);
                        int CLPrayer = GetCLPrayer(wearID);
			int CLSlayer = GetCLSlayer(wearID);
			int CLFarming = GetCLFarming(wearID);
                        int CLMining = GetCLMining(wearID);
[/CODE]

Then under:
[CODE]
			if (CLAttack > playerLevel[playerAttack]) {
				sendMessage("You need " + CLAttack + " " + statName[playerAttack] + " to equip this item.");
				GoFalse = true;
			}
[/CODE]

Add these:

[CODE]
if (CLMining > playerLevel[playerMining]) {
				sendMessage("You need " + CLMining + " " + statName[playerMining] + " to equip this item.");
				GoFalse = true;
			}
if (CLSlayer > playerLevel[playerSlayer]) {
				sendMessage("You need " + CLSlayer + " " + statName[playerSlayer] + " to equip this item.");
				GoFalse = true;
			}
if (CLFarming > playerLevel[playerFarming]) {
				sendMessage("You need " + CLFarming + " " + statName[playerFarming] + " to equip this item.");
				GoFalse = true;
			}
if (CLSlayer > playerLevel[playerSlayer]) {
				sendMessage("You need " + CLSlayer + " " + statName[playerSlayer] + " to equip this item.");
				GoFalse = true;
			}
if (CLPrayer > playerLevel[playerPrayer]) {
				sendMessage("You need " + CLPrayer + " " + statName[playerPrayer] + " to equip this item.");
				GoFalse = true;
			}
if (CLHerblore > playerLevel[playerHerblore]) {
				sendMessage("You need " + CLHerblore + " " + statName[playerHerblore] + " to equip this item.");
				GoFalse = true;
			}
if (CLAgility > playerLevel[playerAgility]) {
				sendMessage("You need " + CLAgility + " " + statName[playerAgility] + " to equip this item.");
				GoFalse = true;
			}
if (CLAgility > playerLevel[playerAgility]) {
				sendMessage("You need " + CLAgility + " " + statName[playerAgility] + " to equip this item.");
				GoFalse = true;
			}
if (CLFishing > playerLevel[playerFishing]) {
				sendMessage("You need " + CLFishing + " " + statName[playerFishing] + " to equip this item.");
				GoFalse = true;
			}
if (CLHitpoints > playerLevel[playerHitpoints]) {
				sendMessage("You need " + CLHitpoints + " " + statName[playerHitpoints] + " to equip this item.");
				GoFalse = true;
			}
[/CODE]
Then Search For:

[CODE]
public int GetCLDefence(int ItemID) {
[/CODE]

And ABOVE that add these:

[CODE]
	 public int GetCLHitpoints(int ItemID) {
if (ItemID == 7623 {
			return 135;
		}
if (ItemID == 7624 {
			return 135;
		}

}


	 public int GetCLFishing(int ItemID) {
if (ItemID == 7630 {
			return 135;
		}
if (ItemID == 7631 {
			return 135;
		}

}


	 public int GetCLCooking(int ItemID) {
if (ItemID == 7632 {
			return 135;
		}
if (ItemID == 7633 {
			return 135;
		}

}


	 public int GetCLAgility(int ItemID) {
if (ItemID == 7634 {
			return 135;
		}
if (ItemID == 7635 {
			return 135;
		}

}

	 public int GetCLHerblore(int ItemID) {
if (ItemID == 7638 {
			return 135;
		}
if (ItemID == 7639 {
			return 135;
		}

}

	 public int GetCLPrayer(int ItemID) {
if (ItemID == 7640 {
			return 135;
		}
if (ItemID == 7641 {
			return 135;
		}

}


	 public int GetCLSlayer(int ItemID) {
if (ItemID == 7653 {
			return 135;
		}
if (ItemID == 7654 {
			return 135;
		}

}


	 public int GetCLFarming(int ItemID) {
if (ItemID == 7655 {
			return 135;
		}
if (ItemID == 7656 {
			return 135;
		}

}
[/CODE]

then search for 
[CODE]
public int GetCLAttack(int ItemID)
[/CODE]

then under that add 

[CODE]
if (ItemID == 7648 {
			return 135;
		}
if (ItemID == 7649 {
			return 135;
		}
if (ItemID == 7642 {
			return 135;
		}
[/CODE]

then search for: 
[CODE]
public int GetCLDefence(int ItemID)
[/CODE]

and add this under it:

[CODE]
if (ItemID == 7650 {
			return 135;
		}
if (ItemID == 7651 {
			return 135;
		}
if (ItemID == 7664 {
			return 135;
		}
if (ItemID == 7642 {
			return 135;
		}
if (ItemID == 7643 {
			return 135;
		}
[/CODE]

then search for:
[CODE]

public int GetCLStrength(int ItemID)
[/CODE]

and under it add:

[CODE]
if (ItemID == 7636 {
			return 135;
		}
if (ItemID == 7637 {
			return 135;
		}
if (ItemID == 7644 {
			return 135;
		}
if (ItemID == 7642 {
			return 135;
		}
[/CODE]

then search for:
[CODE]

public int GetCLMagic(int ItemID)
[/CODE]

and add this under it:
[CODE]
if (ItemID == 7626 {
			return 135;
		}
if (ItemID == 7627 {
			return 135;
		}
[/CODE]


then search for:
[CODE]

public int GetCLRanged(int ItemID)
[/CODE]

And add this under it:
[CODE]
if (ItemID == 7628 {
			return 135;
		}
if (ItemID == 7628 {
			return 135;
		}
if (ItemID == 7622 {
			return 135;
		}

[/CODE]

And thats the end of Level Requirement By Dan

Read full topic
